summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding a draft response to defense preservation requests in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It shows internal coordination on legal strategy and document preservation issues.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The case subject; the draft response is to preservation requests from his defense team.

events.title: Email on Draft Response to Defense
events.description: Internal email forwarding a draft response to defense preservation requests in the Epstein case, indicating ongoing legal preparations.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from August 7, 2019, regarding the Epstein case.
It discusses a draft response to defense preservation requests, indicating active litigation preparation.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email mentions the draft is based on conversations with an individual referred to as 'M'.
The attachment is a letter to the defense regarding preservation requests, suggesting it was intended for potential filing with a motion.
